text: i still remember  my first time entering the forest as a kid, i was so amazed at the giant trees and vines and rivers and glowing mysticsm of it all. and this sound track was the perfect addition to such a beautiful area. thanks for uploading

text: This OST is arguably Sakimoto's best work in my opinion (aside from maybe Vagrant Story when I'm in a dark ambient mood). He even outshines Mitsuda here.

text:
Such a good track! I loved this one and the atmosphere in the forest maze! I've been playing this game for 25 hours and I love it. Finding it so underrated so far!
I like the story and characters, the music, love the atmosphere and scenery and I like the battle system and gameplay too.

text: Wow this is beautiful, the piano and the guitar combine so well. Makes you feel literally in a lost forest, I really miss this kind of old school games. Reminds me a bit of Chrono Trigger or maybe it's because I've been thinking lately that I would love a remake of that jewel.

text: Argh! The comments here make me greatly regret not buying this game. I loved the original, but I was stupid and let the name of the game throw me off. I mean Legaia 2: Duel Saga sounds kind of like a fighting game, also the back of the game case did not make it seem much like an RGP. I feel so dumb and wish I could play this now. This song is brilliant and apparently the gameplay is not bad either. Maybe one day...
